entries.journal_entry_description: Defeat the crazed ex-Jedi hiding on the Rryatt Trail.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Your next trial from Krepauk is to defeat the crazed ex-Jedi, Urootar, who conceals himself on the Rryatt Trail.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Krepauk and let him know of your success against Urootar, the crazed ex-Jedi of the Rryatt Trail.
